roles.title: Application Engineer, Operations
description: Architect and maintain internal APIs and microservices powering telecom operations and business workflows
Build real-time dashboards and web tools that provide operational visibility across teams
Design ETL pipelines handling automated data ingestion, transformation, and scheduled reporting
Implement secure authentication, role-based access control, and comprehensive audit logging
Deploy and manage containerized services on Kubernetes and OpenShift platforms
Integrate third-party systems including messaging APIs, ticketing platforms, and telecom gateways

roles.title: Data Automation Engineer
description: Developed automated data pipelines reducing manual reporting effort by significant margins
Built Python-based ETL workflows for data cleaning, validation, and transformation
Created Jira API integrations for streamlined project tracking and sprint analytics
Designed interactive dashboards enabling data-driven operational decisions
